You are free to distribute, and/or electronically transmit or transfer this Personal version of the Software as long as you distribute all of the files included here.  You may not distribute this version of the Software as part of any commercial product, or in any other way profit by distribution of this version of the Software.

You may not use, modify the Software, or any copy, in whole or in part, except as expressly provided for in this Agreement.  You may not decompile, disassemble, or reverse engineer the Software.  Any attempt to transfer any of the rights, duties, or obligations hereunder except as expressly provided for in this Agreement is void.  You agree to comply with U.S.  export regulations, when applicable.

OS/tools does not warrant that the Software will meet your requirements, that operation of the Software will be uninterrupted or error-free, or that all errors will be corrected.

Well, at least the lawyers are happy, now.  We hope you will be too.
